text: Petracola angustisoma is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Peru. ==References== Category:Petracola Category:Reptiles of Peru Category:Endemic fauna of Peru Category:Reptiles described in 2015 Category:Taxa named by Lourdes Y. Echevarría Category:Taxa named by Pablo J. Venegas
title: Petracola angustisoma
